title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue arises from the fact that setting the output location and classpath are separate operations. By setting the output location first, it creates an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the project settings.
2. Set the output location.
3. Set the classpath.
4. Press Ok.
